title: Unchained Alistar
body: Is there anyway to get unchained Alistar and if so how can I? Thanks

replies.body: They removed the offer from Youtube, but you can still submit a [Support Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and the bot will automatically add it to your account. Just use the category **I have a question > Game & Features > General Questions** and have "Unchained Alistar" in the title.
Do i have to ask for it? Thanks a log
